description: absorb +â€Ž -able. First attested in the the late 18th century..

adjectives.description: absorbable (comparative more absorbable, superlative most absorbable)

entries.meaning: Capable of being absorbed or swallowed up.
A material that can be absorbed.
examples: There is general agreement that nonabsorbable materials are better than absorbables. The most popular materials are polypropylene mesh and PTFE produced as a patch.
